name: Bible Quiz to Unlock Phone
tagline: Answer Scripture correctly before accessing apps
description:
FaithLock's signature feature requires you to correctly answer a Bible quiz before unlocking blocked applications. This transforms every unlock attempt into a moment of Scripture engagement and spiritual growth.

Unlike simple delay-based blockers, our quiz system ensures genuine engagement with God's Word—you can't just tap through mindlessly.
howItWorks:
How the Bible Quiz System Works:

  1. App Block Triggers: When you try to open a blocked app (Instagram, TikTok, etc.), FaithLock intervenes
  2. Random Verse Presented: A curated Bible verse appears with context
  3. Quiz Question: Multiple choice, fill-in-blank, or thematic question about the verse
  4. Limited Attempts: You have 2-3 attempts to answer correctly
  5. Unlock or Reflect: Correct answer unlocks app; incorrect prompts reflection time

The quiz difficulty adapts to your Scripture knowledge level, ensuring it's challenging but not frustrating.
benefits: Break the mindless scrolling dopamine loop
Transforms temptation into spiritual growth opportunity

useCases.title: College Student Overcoming Social Media Addiction
useCases.description: Sarah, 21, was checking Instagram 80+ times daily. With Bible Quiz unlock, she now reads 30+ verses per day just from unlock attempts. After 30 days, her social media time dropped 73% and she's memorized 45 verses.

faqs.question: What happens if I can't answer the Bible quiz?
faqs.answer: After 2-3 incorrect attempts, you're encouraged to reflect on the verse for 60 seconds before trying again. This isn't punishment—it's an opportunity to genuinely engage with Scripture rather than rush through.

faqs.question: Can I choose which apps require Bible quiz?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You select which apps get blocked and require quiz unlock. Common choices: Instagram, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, news apps. You control the list completely.

faqs.question: What if I'm new to the Bible and don't know answers?
faqs.answer: Our adaptive difficulty system starts with basic verses and questions. You'll learn progressively. Plus, every quiz includes the verse text, so you're learning as you answer. New believers love this feature for Bible literacy building.

faqs.question: How is this different from apps that just show verses?
faqs.answer: Simply displaying verses allows mindless tapping through. Our quiz REQUIRES engagement and comprehension. Brain science shows active retrieval (quizzing) creates 2-3x stronger memory retention than passive reading.

name: App Blocks Instagram Until You Read Bible

description:

This hard blocking + Scripture requirement is the most effective combination for breaking compulsive social media habits.
howItWorks:
Hard Block Technology:

  3. Custom App Selection: You choose which apps to block (Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, YouTube, etc.)
  4. Scheduled Blocking: Set specific times (e.g., 9 PM - 7 AM, during work hours)
  5. Emergency Override: With intentional friction and reflection period
benefits: Proven 73% reduction in targeted app usage
No workarounds or bypasses (unlike weak blockers)
Works even if FaithLock is deleted (system-level)
Reports show blocked attempts and Bible verses read

faqs.answer: Any app on your iPhone: Instagram, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, Facebook, Snapchat, Reddit, news apps, games, etc. Most users block 3-8 apps that consume most time.
